# refusesFirstResponder

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value indicating whether the receiver refuses the first responder role.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var refusesFirstResponder: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the receiver refuses the first responder role; otherwise, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Related Documentation

- **objectValue**: The value of the receiver’s cell as an Objective-C object.
- **doubleValue**: The value of the receiver’s cell as a double-precision floating-point number.
- **floatValue**: The value of the receiver’s cell as a single-precision floating-point number.

## Activating from the Keyboard

- **performClick(_:)**: Simulates a single mouse click on the receiver.
